data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Boonsoong, Boonsatien, Braasch, Dietrich (2013): Heptageniidae (Insecta, Ephemeroptera) of Thailand. ZooKeys 272: 61-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.272.3638, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.272.3638
